alert.note: Alert for Nacogdoches; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 11:28AM CDT until April 10 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Angelina River Near Cushing affecting Nacogdoches and Rusk Counties. For the East Fork Angelina River...including Cushing...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Angelina River Near Cushing. * WHEN...From this evening to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 15.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1130 AM CDT.
